ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Farewell Shada; safe journey
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Elfson :P I got mine by playing my sub-52 rogue on NUMEROUS Vox raids. I might still keep him at 52 just in case we go do vox/nag again. Also some people
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Elfson :P

I got mine by playing my sub-52 rogue on NUMEROUS Vox raids. I might still
keep him at 52 just in case we go do vox/nag again. Also some people will
de-level and leave corpses to be ressed because they want to participate.
*shrug* i'd rather bring a secondary.

Grats on 53, you will love Twilight!

Sartori<Legion>
60th Virtuoso, Veeshan


>From: "Matt DeBarger" <mattdeba@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>To: <eqbards@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Farewell Shada; safe journey
>Date: Tue, 27 Mar 2001 11:03:10 -0500
>
>Grats Sartori!!!!! From a fellow Veeshan bard...
>
>Heh, and I was excited to ding 53 and get Song of Twilight :-)
>
>Was on a failed Vox raid this week and got so fed up with the munchkins
>(the
>really bad players seem to have made it to lvl 50 now) that I decided to go
>and lvl to 53 so I would never deal with crap like that again...
>
>Of course I immediatly get an invite to Fear (thus no xp) and spend the
>nexty 8 hours clearing it. We even got to kill the enraged? golem (the
>thing that the broken golem spawns). Got my tendril and an imbrued bracer
>(from a cube).
>
>But I managed to get enough time at Dog Capt on Saturday to hit 53 :) (sigh
>I leave 52 with neither scale and without Selo's Drums)
>
>Elfson Allegro 53 Veeshan
>(once again the free range bard for hire)
>
